params.name: _None_
params.function: Show current Save power changes state

params.name: 0 / off
params.function: Do not save power changes and do not set relay after restart

params.name: 1 / on
params.function: (default) Save power changes and set relay after restart

params.name: 0 / off
params.function: (default) Set self-locking mode for all relays

params.name: 1 / on
params.function: Set interlock mode for all relays

params.name: 0 / off
params.function: (default) Keep using POWER without postfix for single power devices

params.name: 1 / on
params.function: Add postfix to all POWER messages
